data.buttons.login: The title that appears in step one of the form
data.constants.phoneNumber: Label used for phone number input field
data.constants.emailAddress: Label used for email address input field
data.error.networkError: The error that appears when there is no internet connection
data.error.errorPhoneNumberNotFound: Error message for phone number not found
data.error.errorEmailAddressNotFound: Error message for email address not found
data.label.error: Generic error message for invalid form nput
data.login.stepOneInstruction: The instruction that appears in step one of the form
data.login.username: The label that appears on the mobile number input
data.login.passwordLabel: The label that appears on the password input
data.login.submit: The label that appears on the submit button
data.login.verify: The label that appears on the verify code button
data.login.forgotPassword: The label that appears on the Forgot password button
data.login.submissionError: The error that appears when the user entered details are unauthorised
data.login.forbiddenCredentialError: The error that appears when the user entered details are forbidden
data.login.codeSubmissionError: The error that appears when the user entered sms code is unauthorised
data.login.fieldMissing: The error if user doesn't fill all the field
data.login.resentSMS: The message that appears when the resend button is clicked and tells user than code is resent to email
data.login.resentEMAIL: The message that appears when the resend button is clicked and tells user than code is resent to email
data.login.stepTwoResendTitle: The title that appears in step two of the form after resend button click
data.login.resend: Text for button that resends SMS or email verification code
data.login.stepTwoTitle: The title that appears in step two of the form
data.login.stepOneText: The instruction that appears in step one of the login form
data.login.stepTwoInstruction.sms: The instruction that appears in step two of the form that lets users know that code has been sent to phone
data.login.stepTwoInstruction.email: The instruction that appears in step two of the form that lets users know that code has been sent to email
data.resend.sms: Text for button that resend SMS or email verification code
data.resetCredentials.form.title: Title used reset credentials forms
data.resetCredentials.forgottenItem.form.titl: Title used for forgotten item form
data.resetCredentials.forgottenItem.form.body: Body header for forgotten item form
data.resetCredentials.label.field.verificatio: Label used for verification code input field
data.resetCredentials.label.field.answer: Label used for answer input field
data.resetCredentials.phoneNumberConfirmation: Form body header used in the body of phone number confirmation step
data.resetCredentials.emailAddressConfirmatio: Form body header used in the body of email address confirmation step
Form body header used for recovery code entry step
Form body subheader used for recovery code entry step in mobile flow
Form body subheader used for recovery code entry step in email flow
data.resetCredentials.recoveryCodeEntry.codeR: The title that appears in step two of the form after resend button click
The message that appears when the resend button is clicked.
data.resetCredentials.securityQuestion.form.b: Form body subheader used for security question step
data.resetCredentials.success.page.title: Title for success page
data.resetCredentials.success.page.subtitle.p: Subtitle for success page for phone
data.resetCredentials.success.page.subtitle.e: Subtitle for success page for email
data.validations.required: The error message that appears on required fields
data.validations.minLength: The error message that appears on fields with a minimum length
data.validations.numberRequired: The error message that appears on fields where the value must be number
data.validations.phoneNumberFormat: The error message that appears on phone numbers where the first character must be a 0
data.validations.emailAddressFormat: The error message that appears on email address
data.validations.mobilePhoneRegex: The regular expression to use when validating a local mobile phone number
data.validations.mobileNumberFormat: The format of the mobile number that appears in an error message
data.validations.requiredSymbol: A blank error message. Used for highlighting a required field without showing an error
data.constants.skipToMainContent: Label for a keyboard accessibility link which skips to the main content
